items.name: Achari Bhindi Masala
items.description: A delicious spicy-tangy dish from north India. Okra cooked in onion & tomato based gravy with pickling spices
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Chicken Ghee Roast
items.description: Manglorean chicken dish cooked with ghee, onion and dried red chili paste and garnished with fresh coriander
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 paratha + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Bread Upma
items.description: Bread pieces toasted in ghee and cooked with onions, curry leaves, peanuts and chilli and tempered with mustard seeds.

items.name: Chicken Tehari
items.description: A one pot dish of chicken thighs and drumstick cooked together with onion, chillies, bay leaves, tomato and rice topped with garam masala.

items.name: Mirchi Ka Salan
items.description: A popular curry from Hyderabad with variety of low heat chillies in tangy flavourful gravy made of onion, tomato, garlic and ginger and topped with fresh corriander
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas or rice + side salad + papad

items.name: Kosha Mangsho
items.description: Bengali lamb curry marinated in ginger garlic paste, chillies, yogurt and spices and cooked to perfection. Topped with garam masala and ghee
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 paratha + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Oats and Rava Idli
items.description: Steamed cakes made of oats and semolina (granulated wheat) mixed with yogurt, onion, cashew and chilles. Served with coconut chutney.

items.name: Palak Paneer Paratha
items.description: Spinach and Indian cottage cheese pureed and mixed in whole wheat dough with spices and rolled into a flatbread cooked on a hot pan. Served with tomato and onion tangy chutney. (4 parathas)

items.name: Goan Khatkhate
items.description: A comforting dish from Goa made with spiced vegetable curry with coconut, lentils and kokum.
items.extra: make it a meal with rice + side salad + papad

items.name: Kerala Beef Curry
items.description: A delicious south indian beef curry dish cooked with onion, tomato, garlic, ginger and fresh spices topped with fresh coriander and garam masala
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 kerala parotta + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Ragada Pattice
items.description: A Indian street food with crispy shallow fired potato patty served with flavourful chickpea curry topped with spicy green chutney, tangy sweet chutney, onion, coriander, sev, and pomagrante seeds. (2 pieces)

items.name: Dhaba Style Dal Kichidi
items.description: Rice lentils, onion, tomato, ginger, garlic & chilli pressure cooked together and tempered with different spices for the flavourful taste. Served with papad. A complete comfort meal.

items.name: Malai Kofta
items.description: A curried vegetarian dish with crispy fired balls made of potato & Indian cottage cheese in a creamy, smooth, rich sauce
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Malvani Chicken Curry
items.description: A dish from the coastal regions of Maharashtra. Chicken cooked with onion, garlic, ginger, coconut and special Malvani spice mix topped with fresh coriander.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 chapati or rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Oats Vegetable Upma
items.description: A healthier version of the semolian upma. Oats cooked with onion, tomato, carrot, peanuts, curry leaves and tempered with mustard seeds.

items.name: Bisli Bhat
items.description: Rice cooked with veggies, onion, tomato, chillies and spices; stir fried and tempered with mustard seeds and peanuts. Served with papad.

items.name: Paneer Makhni
items.description: Creamy buttery gravy made with onion, tomato, cashew, garlic & ginger with soft cottage cheese cubes
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Prawns Briyani
items.description: Prawns marinated in ginger-garlic paste, spices, chillies and cooked together in onion & tomato based light gravy and then layered with fragrant basmati rice, caramalised onions, mint and corinader. Served with a side of yougurt raita + papad + achar

items.name: Dahi Bhalle
items.description: A street food dish from Delhi. Fried lentil balls topped with chillied & spiced yogurt, spicy green chutney, sweet tangy chutney and crispy boondi.

items.name: Pongal
items.description: Rice lentils pressure cooked together and tempered with different spices, curry leaves and cashew and served with a side of coconut chutney.

items.name: Veg Hakka Noodles
items.description: Indo-Chinese dish with assorted veggies cooked with chinese sauces and noodles
items.extra: make it special with some veg manchurian gravy

items.name: Chicken Hakka Noodles
items.description: Indo-Chinese dish with assorted veggies and chicken cooked with chinese sauces and noodles.
items.extra: make it special with some chicken manchurian gravy

items.name: Mix Veg Pancake
items.description: A mix of different veggies mixed with batter and cooked on a pan for a crispy layer. Served with a side of spicy schezwan chutney.

items.name: Rasam Rice
items.description: A comforting dish from the south of India. Toamto, tamarind, garlic, cumin cooked together with homemade rasam powder for a soupy consistency. Best eaten with hot rice and papad

items.name: Dahi wale Aloo
items.description: A potato curry made in yogurt based gravy with cashew melon paste and other spices.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Afghani Chicken
items.description: A creamy delicious chicken dish made with yogurt, cream, onions, cashew paste, spices and chilles
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Chana Chaat
items.description: Boiled chickpeas pan roasted and topped with sweet and tangy chutney, spicy green chutney, roasted potatoes, pomegranate seeds, onion, tomato, fresh spices and coriander

items.name: Rajma Chawal
items.description: Red kidney beans cooked in a flavourful gravy with onion, tomato, ginger, garlic and spices and topped with fresh garam masala and coriander. Served with steamy rice and papad.

items.name: Chana Saag
items.description: A delicious one pot curry of chickpeas and spinach made with onion, ginger, garlic and tomato with other spices
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Murgir Jhol
items.description: A wholesome chicken curry from the state of Kolkata. Chicken cooked with flavourful spices, onion, potatoes, ginger, garlic and yogurt
items.extra: make it a meal with rice/ paratha + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Sabudana Vada
items.description: Soaked sago pearls mixed with boiled mashed potatoes, cumin seeds and peanuts made into a patty and shallow fried for a crispy outer layer. Served with sweetened yogurt on the side. (3 vada)

items.name: Palak Lasun Dal Kichdi
items.description: Spinach, garlic, lentils, onion and spices cooked together with in a pressure cooker and then tempered with cumin seeds, garlic and onions.

items.name: Bhuna Mushroom Masala
items.description: Mushrooms cooked in onion tomato based gravy with ginger, garlic and freshly roasted spices.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Prawns Ghee Roast
items.description: A dish from Mangalore with juicy prawns marinated in freshly fiery spice mix and cooked in ghee and curry leaves.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Veg Crispy Tikki
items.description: Mix veggies grated and mixed with spices and flour and shapped into a patty and shalow fried. Served with spicy green chutney. (3 tikkis)

items.name: Aloo Paratha
items.description: Wholewheat Indian flatbread stuffed with a mixture of mashed potato, onion, chillies and spices. Served with achar and a side on onion & tomato chutney. (2 parathas)

items.name: Nawabi Paneer
items.description: Indian cottage cheese cooked in a thik gravy of cashew and almond paste with whole spices, onion ginger-garic paste and cream
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Lamb do Pyaza
items.description: A hearty lamb curry with generous amount of crunchy onions, yogurt and a burst of spices topped with fresh coriander
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Kolkata Kathi Roll
items.description: Famous street food of Kolkata. Flaky wholewheat flatbread pan cooked and stuffed with egg omlette, spices, picked onions and cucumber made into a roll.

items.name: Sambar Rice
items.description: A comfort meal from the south of India. Lentils and veggies cooked together with tamarind, and freshly made sambar masala tempered with mustard seeds and curry leaves. Served with rice + papad

items.name: Paneer Makhni Biryani
items.description: Indian cottage cheese cooked in a thick creamy buttery gravy of onion, tomato, cashew, ginger and garlic and then layered with aromatic basmati rice, caramalised onion, coriander, mint and slow cooked on flame. Served with a side of yogurt dip + papad

items.name: Awadhi Chicken Biryani
items.description: A delicious chicken biryani from Lucknow. Chicken marinated with caramalised onion, whole spices, tomato, rose water, milk and yogurt and then cooked with layers of fragrant basmati rice. Served with a side of yogurt dip + papad + achar

items.name: Shami Kebab
items.description: Lipsmacking street food from the northern part of India. Minced meat and chana dal mixed with different spices and ground into a smooth mixture and shapped into a patty and shallow fried. Served with green chutney on the side. (3 pieces)

items.name: Coconut Rice
items.description: Aromatic basmati rice cooked in ghee with cashew, curry leaves, dried chilli and fresh coconut, tempered with mustard seeds

items.name: Veg Schezwan Frankie
items.description: Shallow fried spicy mashed potato wrapped in whole wheat flatbread with onions and frankie masala. Served with green chutney.

items.name: Lemon Rice
items.description: Rice, cashews, chillies and other spices stir fried together and mixed with lime juice. Served with achar and papad
